main event: A sighting of a 'Flying Saucer' was reported on January 2, 1950, by a witness in Brooklyn.
interesting points: The object was visible for about three minutes and remained stationary in the clouds., It emitted a bluish-green glow that was very intense for about 30 seconds., The sighting occurred at an estimated altitude of 3500 feet., The report was forwarded to the Commanding General at Wright-Patterson Air Force Base for further action., The document originates from Project Blue Book, an official investigation into UFO sightings.
sighted object: a 'Flying Saucer' emitting a bluish-green glow
